Erasmus+ program management easy

Enhance management efficiency of academic exchanges under Erasmus+ program by monitoring different participants: students, teachers and staff. The application improves management workflow by providing easy access to mobilities information, by tracking mobility documents uploaded by participants during their mobilities, and by generating automatically official mobility documents on demand.

How it works

1Manage list of participants, their personal data and their uploaded files
2Create, edit and delete participants, and choose specific actions to make your work easier
3Monitor data and statistics about mobility projects

Participant documents storage

Monitor all required documents from participants during their mobility time. Track different versions timeline.

Mobility documents generation

Create automatically official mobility documents on demand. Different documents customization for each educational institution.

Erasmus+ Mobility Tool integration

Convenient integration with the official web platform management tool for mobility projects under the Erasmus+ programme. Import and export CSV data easily.

More great features

Mailer system

Data backup

GDPR compliance
